title: Password Recovery
body: I got a password recovery email and when i tried to log in my password was changed. I was able to change my password back again thankfully, how could they get into my account without having access to my email?

replies.body: If you had an unexpected password reset e-mail and you don't remember requesting it, there's a decent chance they could actually have hacked into your email as well. I'd suggest changing your email password too just in case, but go ahead and reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you worried that someone else still has access to your account!
